title: 5 Less Known Features of Android [part 2]
tags: How to scan documents in android
Send WhatsApp message without touching your phone with google now
Use a file browser without a file browser
description: Part I   In this quick video, we will see some little known - yet useful features of Android  [Video content]  #1 Easy way to Scan documents with Google drive #2 Avoid accidentally closing of the screen with screen pinning. #3 Send WhatsApp message without touching your phone with google now #4 Permanently delete data with encryption before selling your phone  #5 Use a file browser without a file browser
